item.description:
Appropriately for nearly Valentine's Day, the February selection for "Science on Screen" "pays tribute to the flawed but honorable man who revolutionized our understanding of human sexuality."  Read the full summary and biography of Sandra R. Scantling,Assistant Clinical Professor of Psychiatry at the University of Connecticut School of Medicine, and nationally recognized intimacy expert, author, certified sex therapist, and psychotherapist in private practice in Farmington, CT, at the website for this event:   http://www.realartways.org/cinema.htm#kinsey 

(2004, USA, 118 mins)

Admission:
Real Art Ways Members: $5 (the same price since 1996!)
Seniors & Students Members: $4.50
Regular Admission (non-members): $10
Seniors (62+) / Students (full-time with ID): $7

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Science on Screen: "Kinsey" @ RAW
